docs.snippet: WHEN there is nothing much, doing that is news at the United Nations Buildings on the Manhattan side of the East River, there may still be quite a lot going on. The meetings of the Assembly, or the occasional dramatic sessions of the Security...
docs.lead_paragraph: WHEN there is nothing much, doing that is news at the United Nations Buildings on the Manhattan side of the East River, there may still be quite a lot going on. The meetings of the Assembly, or the occasional dramatic sessions of the Security Council, make the front pages and lead the radio bulletins.
docs.abstract: R L Duffus article on everday work of UN; illus

headline.main: The 'Unknown' U. N.; The 'Unknown' United Nations

docs.snippet: CARROLLTON, Ga., April 23 (AP)--Betsy Rawls today held her 4-stroke lead over Patty Berg after the second round of the $5,000 Carrollton women's open golf tournament. Miss Rawls shot a 74 for 141.
docs.lead_paragraph: CARROLLTON, Ga., April 23 (AP)--Betsy Rawls today held her 4-stroke lead over Patty Berg after the second round of the $5,000 Carrollton women's open golf tournament. Miss Rawls shot a 74 for 141.

headline.main: Miss Rawls Tallies 141 and Retains Lead in Carrollton Golf Tournament; PACE-SETTER GETS 74 FOR 2D ROUND

docs.snippet: The Maritime Administration is studying a Hoover Commission recommendation that all obsolete, over-age, badly damaged or useless ships in the defense reserve fleet be scrapped.
docs.lead_paragraph: The Maritime Administration is studying a Hoover Commission recommendation that all obsolete, over-age, badly damaged or useless ships in the defense reserve fleet be scrapped.
docs.abstract: Maritime Adm studies Comm proposal to scrap obsolete or useless ships in defense reserve fleet; comment on some of 27 ships affected

headline.main: SCRAP-SHIP PLAN PUT UNDER STUDY; Maritime Board Scans Hoover Commission Suggestions on Idle Pre-War Vessels

docs.snippet: BALBOA, C. Z., May 3--Buffeted by veering winds that caused some men to land outside the drop zone, about 550 paratroopers "retook" the Rio Hato area today during military exercise Barracuda I.
docs.lead_paragraph: BALBOA, C. Z., May 3--Buffeted by veering winds that caused some men to land outside the drop zone, about 550 paratroopers "retook" the Rio Hato area today during military exercise Barracuda I.
docs.abstract: drop believed largest ever staged in Latin Amer; 24 hurt; 2,000 Army, Navy and Air Force men in exercise; observers from 15 Latin-Amer countries present

headline.main: BIG AIR DROP STAGED NEAR PANAMA CANAL

byline.original: Special to The New York Times

docs.snippet: GENEVA, May 4 (AP) -- The twenty-six-nation Inter-Governmental Committee for European Migration unanimously approved today a $45,625,000 budget for moving more than 142,000 Europeans to new homes overseas during the current year.
docs.lead_paragraph: GENEVA, May 4 (AP) -- The twenty-six-nation Inter-Governmental Committee for European Migration unanimously approved today a $45,625,000 budget for moving more than 142,000 Europeans to new homes overseas during the current year.
docs.abstract: approves $45,625,000 budget to resettle 142,000 Eurs, '55; breakdown

docs.snippet: UNITED NATIONS, N. Y., May 12 -- Eighteen foreign ministers will attend the tenth anniversary celebration of the United Nations in San Francisco next month.
docs.lead_paragraph: UNITED NATIONS, N. Y., May 12 -- Eighteen foreign ministers will attend the tenth anniversary celebration of the United Nations in San Francisco next month.
docs.abstract: 18 foreign mins, including Sec Dulles (US), Min Pinay (France) to attend fete; others listed

headline.main: 18 FOREIGN MINISTERS ACCEPT U. N. FETE BID

docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, May 20 (AP)-- United States coffee imports from Latin America fell 21 per cent in 1954, it was reported today.
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, May 20 (AP)-- United States coffee imports from Latin America fell 21 per cent in 1954, it was reported today.
docs.abstract: US Commerce Dept repts 30% drop in US exports, '54

headline.main: SLUMP IN IMPORTS OF COFFEE SHOWN; Brazil Chief Loser as Volume From Latin America Fell 21 Per Cent Last Year

docs.snippet: British sterling moved sharply lower last week, with the full impact of the selling coming on Friday, when it declined to $2.79, lowest since early March. Week's highest was $2.79 27/32, and the close at $2.79 1/16, a loss of 23/32 cent from the...
docs.lead_paragraph: British sterling moved sharply lower last week, with the full impact of the selling coming on Friday, when it declined to $2.79, lowest since early March. Week's highest was $2.79 27/32, and the close at $2.79 1/16, a loss of 23/32 cent from the previous week. Forwards widened in sympathy with spot, and transferable sterling closed at $2.7705/.15.

headline.main: FOREIGN EXCHANGE RATES Week Ended May 20, 1955

docs.snippet: PARIS, May 25 (AP) -- America's "big three" of Tony Trabert, Vic Seixas and Hamilton Richardson swept through secondround matches without the loss of a set today in the French tennis tournament.
docs.lead_paragraph: PARIS, May 25 (AP) -- America's "big three" of Tony Trabert, Vic Seixas and Hamilton Richardson swept through secondround matches without the loss of a set today in the French tennis tournament.

headline.main: Six Americans Score in Paris Tennis; TRABERT, SEIXAS GAIN THIRD ROUND
